alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 6:04PM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Chino Valley, Paulden, Prescott, Prescott Valley and Seligman. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Thursday: Chino Valley 2 to 4 inches Paulden 2 to 4 inches Prescott 4 to 6 inches Prescott Valley 3 to 5 inches Seligman 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
